en_text: When Zabimaru is released\Nit can extend and retract
jp_text:
（ルキア）蛇尾丸は 解放すると
その刃節(じんせつ)によって伸縮が可能になり
google_translated:
When the snake fly circle is released
Changes can be made by the blade clause

en_text: It is a frightening weapon.
jp_text:
遠方の敵も
撃破できる恐ろしい武器だ
google_translated:
Even distant enemies
It is a horrible weapon that can be defeated

en_text: When it takes form,
jp_text: 具象化したときの本体は—
google_translated: The main body when we have embodied-

en_text: it is a baboon's body\Nwith a snake for a tail,
jp_text:
猿の体に 蛇の尾
それぞれに人格を備えている
google_translated:
Snake tail on monkey body
Each person has a personality

en_text: You'll have some,\Nwon't you, Rukia?
jp_text: （恋次）ルキア　食うだろう？
